sqlMap.update:
MERGE INTO PSNL0113 A, PSNL0100 B USING PSNL0113 A, PSNL0100 B ON (A.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND A.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.REVN_DT= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , A.ISMT=#ismt# , A.REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr#
, A.STTUR=#sttur# , A.WEI=#wei# , A.TNKEE_VSN_LF=#tnkeeVsnLf# , A.TNKEE_VSN_RGHT=#tnkeeVsnRght# , A.CORR_VSN_LF=#corrVsnLf# , A.CORR_VSN_RGHT=#corrVsnRght# , A.PRMTSA_YN=#prmtsaYn# , A.BLDTP_DIV_CD=#bldtpDivCd# , A.RELN_FRM_CD=#relnFrmCd# , A.HBBY_CTNT=#hbbyCtnt# , A.SPITY_CTNT=#spityCtnt# , A.DABTY_DIV_CD=#dabtyDivCd# , A.DABTY_GRDE_CD=#dabtyGrdeCd# , A.DABTY_AJMT_DT=#dabtyAjmtDt# , A.PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD=#pattVetnsDivCd# , A.PATT_VETNS_NUM=#pattVetnsNum# , A.PATT_VETNS_YN= NVL(#pattVetnsYn#,'N') , A.AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD=#amomRelaDivCd# , A.HLTH_CODTN_CTNT=#hlthCodtnCtnt# , A.HUS_DIV_CD=#husDivCd# , A.HUS_SUM=#husSum# , A.RST_PPTY_SUM=#rstPptySum# , A.MVASST_SUM=#mvasstSum# , A.RIDN_DIV_CD=#ridnDivCd# , A.FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH=#famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , A.HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , A.NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG=#natPennRegrstFlag# , A.IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG=#idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , A.UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#umytInsrRegrstFlag# , B.SX_DIV_CD=#sxDivCd# , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY=#yoobhMnthDay# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.STTUR , A.WEI , A.TNKEE_VSN_LF , A.TNKEE_VSN_RGHT , A.CORR_VSN_LF , A.CORR_VSN_RGHT , A.PRMTSA_YN , A.BLDTP_DIV_CD , A.RELN_FRM_CD , A.HBBY_CTNT , A.SPITY_CTNT , A.DABTY_DIV_CD , A.DABTY_GRDE_CD , A.DABTY_AJMT_DT , A.PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD , A.PATT_VETNS_NUM , A.PATT_VETNS_YN , A.AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD , A.HLTH_CODTN_CTNT , A.HUS_DIV_CD , A.HUS_SUM , A.RST_PPTY_SUM , A.MVASST_SUM , A.RIDN_DIV_CD , A.FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH , A.HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , A.NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG , A.IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG , A.UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #sttur# , #wei# , #tnkeeVsnLf# , #tnkeeVsnRght# , #corrVsnLf# , #corrVsnRght# , #prmtsaYn# , #bldtpDivCd# , #relnFrmCd# , #hbbyCtnt# , #spityCtnt# , #dabtyDivCd# , #dabtyGrdeCd# , #dabtyAjmtDt# , #pattVetnsDivCd# , #pattVetnsNum# , #pattVetnsYn# , #amomRelaDivCd# , #hlthCodtnCtnt# , #husDivCd# , #husSum# , #rstPptySum# , #mvasstSum# , #ridnDivCd# , #famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , #hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , #natPennRegrstFlag# , #idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , #umytInsrRegrstFlag# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0113 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , DABTY_DIV_CD , DABTY_GRDE_CD , DABTY_AJMT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , NVL( ( SELECT COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'A037' AND COMM_CD_NM = TRIM(#dabtyDivCd#) ) , 'A0370000') , NVL( ( SELECT COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'A036' AND COMM_CD_NM = TRIM(#dabtyGrdeCd#) ) , 'A0360000') , #dabtyAjmtDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO PSNL0113 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , STTUR , WEI , TNKEE_VSN_LF , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT , CORR_VSN_LF , CORR_VSN_RGHT , PRMTSA_YN , BLDTP_DIV_CD , RELN_FRM_CD , HBBY_CTNT , SPITY_CTNT , DABTY_DIV_CD , DABTY_GRDE_CD , DABTY_AJMT_DT , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD , PATT_VETNS_NUM , PATT_VETNS_YN , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT , HUS_DIV_CD , HUS_SUM , RST_PPTY_SUM , MVASST_SUM , RIDN_DIV_CD , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #sttur# , #wei# , #tnkeeVsnLf# , #tnkeeVsnRght# , #corrVsnLf# , #corrVsnRght# , #prmtsaYn# , #bldtpDivCd# , #relnFrmCd# , #hbbyCtnt# , #spityCtnt# , #dabtyDivCd# , #dabtyGrdeCd# , #dabtyAjmtDt# , #pattVetnsDivCd# , #pattVetnsNum# , #pattVetnsYn# , #amomRelaDivCd# , #hlthCodtnCtnt# , #husDivCd# , #husSum# , #rstPptySum# , #mvasstSum# , #ridnDivCd# , #famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , #hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , #natPennRegrstFlag# , #idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , #umytInsrRegrstFlag# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0113 SET REVN_DT= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , STTUR=#sttur# , WEI=#wei# , TNKEE_VSN_LF=#tnkeeVsnLf# , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT=#tnkeeVsnRght# , CORR_VSN_LF=#corrVsnLf# , CORR_VSN_RGHT=#corrVsnRght# , PRMTSA_YN=#prmtsaYn# , BLDTP_DIV_CD=#bldtpDivCd# , RELN_FRM_CD=#relnFrmCd# , HBBY_CTNT=#hbbyCtnt# , SPITY_CTNT=#spityCtnt# , DABTY_DIV_CD=#dabtyDivCd# , DABTY_GRDE_CD=#dabtyGrdeCd# , DABTY_AJMT_DT=#dabtyAjmtDt# , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD=#pattVetnsDivCd# , PATT_VETNS_NUM=#pattVetnsNum# , PATT_VETNS_YN= NVL(#pattVetnsYn#,'N') , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD=#amomRelaDivCd# , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT=#hlthCodtnCtnt# , HUS_DIV_CD=#husDivCd# , HUS_SUM=#husSum# , RST_PPTY_SUM=#rstPptySum# , MVASST_SUM=#mvasstSum# , RIDN_DIV_CD=#ridnDivCd# , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH=#famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG=#natPennRegrstFlag# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG=#idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#umytInsrRegrstFlag# WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0113 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
DELETE FROM PSNL0113 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.HAN_NM , B.RESN_REGN_NUM , SUBSTR(B.RESN_REGN_NUM, 0, 6) AS RESNREGNYMN , A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.STTUR , A.WEI , A.TNKEE_VSN_LF , A.TNKEE_VSN_RGHT , A.CORR_VSN_LF , A.CORR_VSN_RGHT , A.PRMTSA_YN , A.BLDTP_DIV_CD , A.RELN_FRM_CD , A.HBBY_CTNT , A.SPITY_CTNT , A.DABTY_DIV_CD , A.DABTY_GRDE_CD , A.DABTY_AJMT_DT , A.PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD , A.PATT_VETNS_NUM , A.PATT_VETNS_YN , A.AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD , A.HLTH_CODTN_CTNT , A.HUS_DIV_CD , A.HUS_SUM , A.RST_PPTY_SUM , A.MVASST_SUM , A.RIDN_DIV_CD , A.FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH , A.HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , A.NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG , A.IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG , A.UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR , B.SX_DIV_CD , B.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY FROM PSNL0113 A, PSNL0100 B WHERE B.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND A.DPOB_CD(+) = B.DPOB_CD AND B.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND A.SYSTEMKEY(+) = B.SYSTEMKEY
